review_text: I've taking AP courses most of my educational life and this was a wonderful  way to bring the skills instilled in me over the years to the forefront of my mind when trying to educate and brand myself as a qualified, and articulate copywriter. This course was definitely useful and worth the cost. I also completed it in one night without boredom . Your money is not wasted here. Ask me directly on IG if you think this is a bot review  @jessi.len .

I have a degree in Writing and I still took a significant amount of knowledge away from this course, frankly I feel I got a bargain. 

However, I don‚Äôt know why the director, director of photography, AD, or frankly ANY crew member on this set did not give the poor instructor some bloody chapstick. Did you hate the guy?
Short but sweet!

This is the first course I followed from start to end with a strong focus. I wrote this review based on the technics I learned from the amazing Shani. In a simple, clear, and elegant style: I enjoyed the journey and the content is perfect.
Script-changing course, very well done. An eloquent speaker and well delivered.
The course presents articulate suggestions with logical progression at a comfortable pace. It will definitely improve my copy editing.
It was very clear. I only wish he ran through creating his own work. From assignment to the end of editing.

I have been trained in law school to write in legalese and passive sentences. This course started with the 4 rules to write clearly and succinctly. I also like the tips on editing for communicating effectively. I would be applying these copy-writing techniques in building my online presence and authority in my area of practice. Thank you very much for this, Shani!
I learned a lot from this course.Basic copy writing and editing techniques now guarded me to shape a valuable content.The learners spoke very simply and taught the skills effectively.
I liked the rhythm of the course and the simplicity of ideas. Thanks for sharing and for helping me out!
Excellent! Very clear and well paced. Easy to understand with insightful content. Highly recommend.
more about the mechanics of writing than how to be a great copywriter. great course if that is what one is looking for but i was looking more for copywriting content, not structure or style

The course gave a great overall viewpoint of how to make your writing better. However, the subtitles were incorrect in a lot of places, which should be looked into as the clarity is lost in some places, which, given the course topic, is not ideal.
I really liked the way this author simplifies all the concepts. It makes it very easy to understand and apply.
Very informative. The style and flow of the course make the content "easy to digest".
A lot of valuable information is packed into this course. I am looking forward to applying the new techniques that I learned.
A worthwhile course to undertake. The tutor delivered the content so well!

I appreciated this course and its effectiveness. I really liked the short videos because they provided a convenient way for me to pace myself and learn a lot in a short period of time. The practice examples provided in the videos were challenging and fun. I am glad that I purchased this course. I feel that I have gained so much and have improved as both a writer and an editor.
Great course for sharpening your writing skills!

It covers fundamentals mostly and is perfect for those who are starting their writing journey. Even if you are an experienced copywriter, the course will help you revisit the basics and enhance your skills. I thoroughly enjoyed the course. It was very detailed and shared tons of exercises.

Le contenu est tr√®s enrichissant, je recommande.
Un grand Merci pour la qualit√© de ce cours.
This course was very informative. It was also engaging and very educational. I can't wait to apply the new skills I've learned to my writing!
Good content!
This course is helpful for both beginners and advanced copywriters. I recommend it to anyone who wants to expand their knowledge and bring better services to their clients.
The course was very detailed, well thought-out and included helpful examples through every chapter. I learned a lot from the course and would definitely recommend to a friend.

Mr. Raja's course was great. I took one of his Udemy courses before and was inspired by him to do more in the editing arena, to use my skillsets learned in corporate for freelance opportunities. The course kept my attention, was practical with engaging examples. I love the way he referenced writing as being musical. I appreciate his suggestions for using his tools right away. And the best takeaway is the editing guide - I will keep this close by.

This course was prepared well and expertly delivered. It helped me realize which skills I need to refine and which ones I am already proficient at. The course taught me how to improve my copywriting and take it to the next level.
Thank you, Shani Raja, for making this course simple, clear, elegant, and evocative!
Fantastic course. It kept me interested and highlighted several things that I need to improve on.
Very insightful and engaging videos
This was an excellent and thorough video.  It was a great refresher course as well as an enhancer! It was definitely relevant to my business and I'm looking forward to implementing the tools.

A really clear, concise and practical guide to improving your writing and editing ability. The material was presented in a way which kept you involved and engaged. You learn tips and techniques which have an immediate positive impact on your written work.
Happy about my purchase and the clear, detailed lessons. Worth every penny.
I've been a journalist and copywriter for more than 20 years, and I learned new things. Highly recommend this course as a helpful refresher on basics and an opportunity to learn new things.
I really liked the way the tutor explains all the concepts, smooth and well delivered.
The course is direct and to the point. I have a lot of useful information at my disposal due to this course.

Taking this course felt like a window into another world. It gave me the answers to the questions that I so often deliberate over and second-guess with my own writing sometimes leading to a long, drawn out process. 
I feel empowered. The editing technique and the secret sauce were the places I needed to go, and pleased that I already follow many of the steps.  

I worked alongside the course, attemping each exercise and comparing my results to the the final, more refined versions. I will most likely take the course again, after I've revisited some of my own posts. I highly recommend this course.
nice Couse I learned a lot!
Good useful content
Very detailed explanation in simple language. Very useful for complete beginners

I have learned so much needed insight on the fundamental writing structures which will enable me to give high-quality writing skills to any project presented at hand. so much confidence received. thank you so much
Fantastic course! I learned a lot!
One of the best courses to develop your writing skills: clear, effective, easy ! Thanks Sir Raja.
Great course!
I enjoyed this course. The ideas are clear and easy to follow.
I had an awesome time learning. I now see words differently and know how to make my writing more firm, clearer and alluring. Thank you! It was worth my money!
Very helpful and insightful!

This course was wonderful for a new writer. I love how he spelled out all of the things that make a good writer in a clear and simple way. It made copywriting feel less intimidating by equipping me with skills that build competence and confidence. Thank you!
Great course! Contains a ton of tips that help you fine tune your copywriting to make it impactful and stylistic.
A truly fantastic course. Even for a reasonably experienced writer like myself, I still learnt a tremendous amount about how to improve my copywriting.
Simply amazing! This video is very informative, providing me with the key aspects and necessary tools used to compose a well-written copy. Thank you Shani!

Oh my god. I will always come back to this course. I have never seen a course more helpful and useful than this one. I wish I had found him sooner. Please, PLEASE take this course. It has helped me in so many ways. My writing is so much better. I was skeptical at first because I had no idea who this guy was. I thought it might be unhelpful or a waste of money. But I think the price needs to be raised by a lot. And I would still pay for it, even after the price was raised. Now I am just rambling, but I am genuinely so thankful for this.

Does what it says on the tin, it is clear, easy to follow and the mini quizzes help to solidify the learning. Would have liked to look at the different types of copy, headlines, sales copy etc to find out what makes good copy vs a bad copy in these specific topics but there was no promise of this in the contents so can't complain. Overall, well presented, a great reference guide course one that I'll be revisiting again and again.
great course I have learned a lot about writing stimulating copy!
There is a grammatical error in the Chapter 4 quiz. It completely threw me off. It's a good course. I would recommend it. Just keep an eye on the Chapter 4 quiz.

This course is a great, comprehensive introduction to copy writing and editing that lays the groundwork for users to learn the necessary tools for improving their writing and then how to go out and use them. I feel much more informed and prepared to move on with my newly acquired skills. The examples, with time for us to make our own attempts first before the instructor gave their take, helped to compare and gauge our own style and skills against a good example from the instructor.
Outstanding experience! Professional, organized, relevant, and engaging.
This course was easy to follow, and I was able to complete it quickly.

The course to Master my copywriting skills was short, concise, and clear. It was an exciting and informative lecture. The quizzes added some flair, creating this interactive aspect. I would definitely recommend this to anyone interested in the 'secret sauce' of mastering copywriting.
Straight to the point, easily digestible, 110% worth your time and money to bring new tools to your copywriting toolbox.
Very useful information that is presented in a straightforward way. I really enjoyed this course.

This is the best course I ever took on Fiverr. I have learned so much. My foundation is now stronger because of all the skills I have learned. I feel more confident in my writing. The entire course was easy to understand and helped boost my confidence. I no longer feel confused about starting to write. This course has given me everything I need to begin my copywriting career. I am so grateful that I chose this course. I will definitely recommend it to anyone & everyone.

Great course. It was very informative and interactive. I would definitely recommend it. My only suggestion is to include a piece of writing for the student to edit in 'Chapter 6: Editing with Style.' I'm completely new to this, so I didn't even know where to start to find a piece of writing to edit. That made that chapter very challenging to complete successfully.
Great course. Very unique insights. With practical steps to learn the maximum. I recommend üëç

There were some useful tips that I could take to heart as an experienced writer.

If I was at a beginner level, I would have the ability to vastly improve very quickly thanks to this class.
This lesson was incredibly well done. I learned many new tips and tricks, and will be applying these skills in all of my writing from now on.
It was a very informative and easy to follow course.
Great course with useful tips and tricks from an experienced writer. Learned new perspectives on the art of copywriting and writing in general. Highly recommend.

the course give me alot to think about in copywriting  how this can work as good on paper and how  good this skill can take me as a writer .  this course have some value  to learn and putting it to use may be very helpful .
Short and Sweet!. I enjoyed it.  A good crash course on writing and copy-editing.
Great course. I must say I learned a lot.
Good to start writing copy and found some inspiration
The most elaborate organised and well explained course I've ever had.
Very clear and practical. I enjoyed learning the basics of copywriting.

Quite disappointed! I didn't see any practical or applicable advice. In fact, it was full of generalities and fluffy things that can be taught in school. Completely unprofessional content for a 43$ course.

Spent money to learn things that are completely obvious to almost any writer. Moreover, the way that useless stuff was presented was too slow. Too many words and analyzing for stating something too simple.

It should be marked as a course for pretty unknowledgeable people about writing who haven‚Äôt graduated from school! ...And for sure the cost of $43 is ridiculous for the quality I received! Very unsatisfied!

I feel like there could have been more concrete examples or tips provided. This didn't provide anything unique or valuable that couldn't be found in a "top 10" style blog or YouTube video. I was hoping for something more from a course called "Master Your Copywriting." This felt like copywriting for beginners.
This course was presented well, was clear and offered good examples to better understand the concepts being taught.

I am very happy I took this course.  Mr. Raja is knowledgable, experienced, and creative.  I write on a daily basis, and I would highly recommend him to anyone who seeks to sharpen their writing and editing skills.  I would add that this course is useful for either the beginner or the more seasoned writer.  
The lessons learned here will always be an essential part of my writing toolbox.
I'm really enjoying this course so far! The instructor is clear, precise and helpful. Additionally, there are exercises in the videos to enhance your writing skills.
Very informative.

I enjoyed the lessons, they were clear and straightforward. Many of the points the instructor mentioned, I have already been practicing in my writings. He provided useful techniques to keep in mind when reading and editing text. I will definitely start reading the Economist to improve my writing skills ;) Thank you! :)

Loads of good tips and techniques that are woefully ignored by too many folks, online and off! As someone with years of experience writing often lengthy and/or technical reports, (and sadly, reading many similar documents too!), I have acquired many of these points already, but it is still useful to review them in a course like this.

Really well presented too - I appreciated that pace and clarity with which the material was delivered.
I thoroughly enjoyed this course. Shani's teaching style made these critical tactics easy to digest and apply.

I enjoyed the course, learned a lot.
I need more practice on my writing skills. The course sky-rockets my learning with wonderful tips and tricks.
a specific, authentic & evocative course for becoming a Great copywrither
Brilliant and thoroughly on point. Great reminders. I enjoyed his lessons.
